creatorText: Hello, Gumroad community! :) I'm Phil Wornath, the mind behind AI Summary Helper. As someone who appreciates the depth of written content, particularly scientific articles, I wanted to overcome the challenges of time constraints. This inspired me to create a tool that boosts productivity and enhances reading efficiency.
whyHelperList: Reclaim Your Time: Generate quick summaries or save in-depth reading for later.
Tailored to Your Needs: Customize summaries to fit your language, profession, or perspective.
Stay Organized: Eliminate cluttered tabs and maintain a manageable reading list.
Enhanced Reading Experience: Focus on meaningful content without the overwhelm.
getStartedText: To begin using AI Summary Helper, ensure you possess an OpenAI API key and adequate credits. Join us in making web reading more efficient and accessible for everyone. Download now on Gumroad and revolutionize your browsing experience.
feedbackSupportText: We are thrilled to invite you to try AI Summary Helper and value your feedback and inquiries. Let's work together to simplify and enrich online reading. Enhance your digital reading journey with AI Summary Helper today!
